title: FIT File: Garmin Connect 5.0, Stages, and More: The Internet on Fire
content:
﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿

For those not subscribed to the FIT File (it’s free!) via your regular podcast app or on YouTube, here’s a quick post with the highlights from the most recent episode.

In this episode, we talk about Garmin Connect’s controversial update, Stages going under, the COROS Vertix 2S, and Zwift’s updates.

0:00 Intro
1:28 Stages Goes Under
13:17 COROS Vertix 2S
26:10 COROS going AMOLED?
34:48 Zwift’s New Software Features
37:09 Zwift’s Training API: TrainerRoad Ahead?
47:09 Garmin Connect 5.0: On Fire?

Thanks to Precision Fuel & Hydration, where you can get 15% off your first order.  Additionally, check out their free Fuel & Hydration Planner.

As a reminder, here’s where you can find the podcast:

  • The FIT File on YouTube.

And then for the audio-only version, you can find it here:

  • Apple Podcasts
  • YouTube Music
  • Spotify
  • RSS Feed

Thanks for listening!
author: DC Rainmaker
